title.rendered: “IDF Plans to Demolish Homes of Jerusalem Shooting Attack Perpetrators: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF announced its intention to demolish the homes of terrorists who carried out the shooting attack in Jerusalem.

Yesterday (Tuesday), a statement was issued on the IDF’s intent to seal off and demolish the residences where the terrorists Murad and Ibrahim Nomar, who carried out a shooting attack on November 30, 2023, at the entrance to Jerusalem, in which Israeli citizens were killed and others injured.

Following the sealing of the terrorists’ homes on December 1, 2023, the commander of the Home Front Command, Major General Raffi Miloh, signed orders extending the sealing and the temporary closure of the terrorists’ homes, until the actual demolition of the homes.
